Commands.Rapid Fire: Random 9-hit ranged BRV attackMastery with 3 uses
Commands.Rapid Fire+: Random 15-hit ranged BRV attack.Target: 2 turns INT BRV Down based on hits taken.Self: 2 turns MAX BRV Up I
Commands.Wind Drake Arrow: Increases BRV based on INT BRV + HP attackSelf: 2 turns Wind Drake's WardMastery with 2 uses
Commands.Wind Drake Arrow+: Grants BRV based on INT BRV + HP attack.Self: 2 turns Wind Drake's Ward
Commands.Brave Phoenix: 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.Raises all party members' BRV based on Initial BRV before the BRV hits.Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.HP damage dealt is divided equally amongst all targets.Grants Princess of Tycoon for 6 turns.Princess of Tycoon grants BRV regen and raises Initial BRV for all party members.

Artifacts.Buffed BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% while buffed.
Artifacts.Buffed Guard: Raises Defense Power by 10% while buffed.
Artifacts.Mighty Rapid Fire: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Rapid Fire by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Wind Drake Arrow: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Wind Drake Arrow.

Passives.Rapid Fire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rapid Fire.
Passives.BRV Danger Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is below Initial BRV.
Passives.Wind Drake Arrow Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after using Wind Drake Arrow.
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage.
Passives.Rapid Fire Charge: Increases the max uses of Rapid Fire by 1.
Passives.Master Base Up: Slightly raises Initial BRV after mastering an ability.
Passives.Wind Drake Arrow Charge: Increases the max uses of Wind Drake Arrow by 1.
Passives.Princess's Devotion: Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, 50% of the excess is divided amongst allies.The healing value is limited to 10% of each target's Max HP.

Weapons.Silver Bow: Allows Rapid Fire to be mastered after 2 uses.Increases the potency of Rapid Fire and Rapid Fire+.When Rapid Fire+ is used, increases the potency of Initial BRV Down and Max BRV Up and extends their duration.
Weapons.Hayate Bow: Allows Wind Drake Arrow to be mastered after 1 use.When Wind Drake Arrow is used (either version), raises the BRV gain and grants it to all allies, grants Wind Drake's Ward to all allies, improves its existing effects and adds a BRV Regen effect.
